snippet: Iran's chief negotiator, Saeed Jalili, is preparing his script for a meeting with world powers in Istanbul this weekend on his country's nuclear program. Here is what might be -- and not be -- in it.
abstract: Iran's chief negotiator, Saeed Jalili, is preparing his script for a meeting with world powers in Istanbul this weekend on his country's nuclear program. Here is what might be -- and not be -- in it.

headline.main: Channeling Iran in the High-Stakes Nuclear Talks
